entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Axkva Min is attempting to break free of her imprisonment. In order to stop her, you created a Nightsister Key of Exile which will grant entrance to the Chamber of Banishment in which she is imprisoned. The entrance is in the cave near the Nightsister Stronghold.
entries.journal_entry_description: Uncover the mystery of the Nightsister headdress at the Adventurers' Guildhall in Aurilia.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find someone in Aurilia who might know more about the Nightsister headdress in the Adventurers' Guildhall.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The only thing the Nightsister prisoner said was, "Axkva Min." Maybe someone in Aurilia will know what that means. Try speaking with Rohak the elder.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Travel to the Nightsister Stronghold and find the Nightsister scrolls. One should tell Axkva Min's tale.
entries.task02_utterance_wave_1: Foul cretin! Move away from those scrolls!
entries.task02_utterance_wave_2: You shall die for this transgression!
entries.task02_utterance_wave_3: I shall protect our history with my life.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Rohak at the Township of Aurilia with the Nightsister scoll about Axvka Min.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: You must obtain the Shard of Hatred, the Shard of Obedience, the Shard of Pity, and the Shard of Indifference so that you can fuse them into the Nightsister Key of Exile.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Rohak at the Township of Aurilia.
entries.task06_item_name: The shards seem uneffected by the lava of Mount Chaolt
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Take the shards to Mount Chaolt on Lok. Fuse the shards in the heat of the lava at the peak of Mount Chaolt.
entries.task06_retrieve_menu_text: Fuse the shards in the lava of Mt.s Chaolt
entries.task07_comm_message_text: Hmm...I don't know why that didn't work?!? Oh, of course. How silly of me. We must use the Force to fuse the shards. Travel to the Blueleaf Temple on Yavin IV. Inside, there should be enough residual emanations of Force to fuse them.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Rohak: "Hmm...I don't know why that didn't work?!? Oh, of course. How silly of me. We must use the Force to fuse the shards. Travel to the Blueleaf Temple on Yavin IV. Inside, there should be enough residual emanations of Force to fuse them."
entries.task08_item_name: The shards unite to form the key to Axkva Min's prison
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Take the shards to the Blueleaf Temple on Yavin IV. Rohak believes that the high concentration of the Force in the temple will fuse the shards. Stand near the blue crystal at the bottom of the main room in the temple.
entries.task09_comm_message_text: Excellent! I should have known that only the Force would be able to unite those shards. Now that you have the key, you should be able to enter the chamber that holds Axkva Min and stop her from escaping!
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Rohak: "Excellent! I should have known that only the Force would be able to unite those shards. Now that you have the key, you should be able to enter the chamber that holds Axkva Min and stop her from escaping!"
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Make your way to an old Sith Shadow camp. I've supplied coordinates to one of their camps to help you find it. Once there, light the torch at the camp to summon Kylaena Haley.
entries.task11_start_message: The torch lights with a burst of flame and heat.
entries.task11_utterance_wave_2: You shall pay for your intrusion!
entries.task11_utterance_wave_3: In Mellichae's name, you shall perish!
entries.task12_journal_entry_description: At the Jedi Temple on Dantooine you will find a Sith statue important to most Dark Jedi. Destroy it. This should attract the attention of Ras Andromias and his minions.
entries.task12_start_message: Damaging the statue has drawn someone's attention.
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: Enter the cave near the Nightsister Stronghold. Inside you will find a Nightsister skull. Touching it will summon its guardian, the rancor named Aranei, who holds the Shards of Obedience.
entries.task13_start_message: You feel an angry wail rattle your soul.
entries.task13_utterance_wave_3: You, %TO, should not have come here. Your death shall appease our ancestors.
entries.task14_journal_entry_description: Travel to the Mountain of the Singing Mountain Clan. Once there, sound the gong outside of their main compound. They will respond. Defeat Gilsaria and take the shards.
entries.task14_start_message: As the echoes of the gong fade away, an ominous silence follows.
entries.task14_utterance_wave_1: Why do you befoul this place?
entries.task14_utterance_wave_2: You shall die for defiling our scrolls!
entries.task14_utterance_wave_3: Begone from this place or die!
